1.12.2.0.0.3:
=Fixed an issue with the mod crashing when on a server
=Fixed an issue with double slabs not working with other mods
+Added a forge update checker to notify players when a update has arrived
1.12.2.0.0.2: =Fixed a bug to do with moving a double slab with a piston using the Quark Pistons move TE feature (Note: there is still an issue with the rendering of the double slab when the piston is moving but this will be fixed as soon as possible)
1.12.2.0.0.1:
+Added the ability to create double slabs using different slab types
+Added WAILA/HWYLA support to show the correct slab
